code: import'./Navigation.css';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{editActive}from'../../store/slices/navigationSlice';import{useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Navigation(){const count=useSelector(state=>state.navigation.active);const dispatch=useDispatch();const tg=window.Telegram.WebApp;const changeActive=e=>{tg.HapticFeedback.impactOccurred('heavy');const id=e.currentTarget.id;dispatch(editActive(id));};useEffect(()=>{if(document.querySelector('.active'))document.querySelector('.active').classList.remove('active');document.querySelector("#".concat(count)).classList.add('active');},[count]);useEffect(()=>{const handleCopy=e=>{e.preventDefault();alert('Copying is not allowed!');};document.addEventListener('copy',handleCopy);return()=>{document.removeEventListener('copy',handleCopy);};},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navigation",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"navigation_block",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{className:"navigation_content",id:"home",onClick:changeActive,to:'/',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"./img/img1.png",alt:"img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Click"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{className:"navigation_content",id:"shop",onClick:changeActive,to:'/shop',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"./img/img2.png",alt:"img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Shop"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{className:"navigation_content",id:"tasks",onClick:changeActive,to:"/tasks",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"./img/img3.png",alt:"img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Tasks"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{className:"navigation_content",id:"profile",onClick:changeActive,to:'/profile',children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"./img/img4.png",alt:"img"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:"Profile"})]})]})]});}export default Navigation;
